name: Jeff has got your back
description:
You and your gang are chased by the pesky police for... no aparent reason. They are simply jelous of you wealth and entrepreneurial skills.

Using your quick wit and the space program drop Amazon™ bombs onto the "baddies". In this case they are the police.

Show them who's Jeff! 

Game designer, artist - Nikodem Kaźmierczak aka VeonardoLaDinci

Programmer - Norbert Kaźmierczak aka vonPiernik
